original_title: In the Line of Duty: Hunt for Justice
overview: When a state trooper is gunned down on a New Jersey highway, his friend and colleague sets out to track down the killers. Realizing the murder is connected to an extensive underground terrorist ring, he joins forces with the FBI on a massive five-state hunt. Based on a true story.
tagline: Humbled by Terror... Torn by Violence... The FBI launches a massive search ti track an inderground cadre of revolutionary terrorists.
title: In the Line of Duty: Hunt for Justice
